## TransientModule interface

Marker for transient modules - creates fresh instance per dependent

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TransientModule<TName extends string = string, TImpl = unknown, TDeps = unknown> extends Module<TName, TImpl, TDeps> 
```
**Extends:** [Module](../module/)<!-- -->&lt;TName, TImpl, TDeps&gt;
